Quizzical

Project links

  • Project Site
  • Project Repository

Introduction

Quizzical is one of the solo projects for Scrimba's Learn React course.

Technologies Used

Quizzical is built with Vite and React.js. The quiz data is fetched from the Open Trivia Database API.
